mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendarevent (event_num, date, time, request_term, cid, status, admin_confirmation, type_a) VALUES (#{event_num}, #{date}, #{time}, #{request_term}, #{cid}, #{status}, #{admin_confirmation}, #{type_a})
